Jessica is a fifth-year UBC student graduating with a Bachelor of Science in Behavioural Neuroscience and a Minor in Data Science.
Her academic interests span the fields of healthcare, neuroscience, and psychology.

Jessica was born and raised up in Victoria, BC - Canada's *garden* city. 

I am a Clinical Research Assistant at BC Children’s Hospital, focusing on pediatric pain management and neurophysiological outcomes. My background includes research in anesthesia, neuroscience, and patient-reported outcomes.
